attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: OK FIRST I open it and they burned my fries not good then I go and I fly over to the moon and someone threw a smoothie at me and then I saw my pet dog get tossed aside for eating my food then I see 20 things of DIET coke and so they are body shaming and then I saw an add on peanuts and I am allergic so then I cried myself to sleep and I just think that is unacceptable behavior to make me cry myself to sleep and then get this they made me pull a door that says PUSH terrible app 0/all numbers

attributes.title: SHDKDHDIHEJE
attributes.review: First of all.. the moment I downloaded this all of my furniture disappeared. Including my pet mermaid. THIS APP STEAL THINGS FROM YOUR HOME. And somehow my grandma told my yellow garden that the color or the parachute smelled like octopus which confused my nearest corner store. So now I have to run to target to buy my grandad a purple teddy bear because he’s afraid of my little pony and now I’m just left here to surrender to McDonald’s and I want the 4 for 4 deal. All. Because. Of. This. App. Therefore one start.

attributes.title: GOOD LORD THIS IS THE WORST
attributes.review: this is the worst app i’ve ever seen upon downloading i started getting calls from my father who’s been gone getting milk for the last 16 years and now it’s stealing all of my photos of obama from my phone and drawing stupid mustaches on him. it keeps glitching our just to show me every photo of the nasty orange man getting spray tanned and inappropriately touching his own daughter 🤢🤢🤢 delete this app now before you get smooth brain

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review:
I can't believe this is still a app on the App Store it should be taken down. As soon as I open the app it tells you to put in a phone number and I didn't instead I complained out loud. Then this trump supporter heard me ( he was wearing THE HAT) came up to me and started to beat me up!!! he kept telling me to put my number in over and over!!
Now I'm in the hospital so DONT GET THIS APP or crazy people will come after you.

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: i was honestly not expecting much from anything coming from trump.. but this truly surprised me. there are so many ads. also, almost every single time i open the app it crashes. it’s so frustrating to use and i’m going to delete the app its so bad. it takes up SO much storage, i have lots of data and it takes up space still. overall horrifying apo

attributes.title: 🧚ROTTEN ORANGE 🍊 🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.review: I was DISGUSTED to see a orange looking like human. I gagged when I saw it. I COULDN’T comprehend HOW A FRICKEN HUMAN COULD LOOK LIKE THAT. Anyways the app was horrible and I saw a racist and rapist in one single orange. NOT ONLY THAT BUT when he opened his mouth.... well umm... it made me want to kill myself but I realized that I SHould moVe back to my own country. The problem was that I have a legal right to live live here sooo.... HAHAHA. My conclusion is that you should never eat an orange unless it’s name is Donald j Trump 👁👄👁🤡🍊🥰🥰🥰🧚🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🧚🏻‍♀️💫💫⭐️

attributes.title: No bueno app
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to be a true trump supporter and learn more on how to save trump from the terrible kids theses day but when I downloaded the app John Cena and Dwayne Johnson started screaming “YOU CANT SEE ME” and the whole entire script for Moana at me and it hurt my feelings so I started cry but out of no where a Cheeto puff started levitating out of the crust crevice of my closet and came and wiped away my tears but turns out that same Cheeto puff had STDs so I’m currently on my way to the hospital

attributes.title: It  destroyed  my family
attributes.review: I opened this app and omg once I saw the Cheeto  on my screen  then I showed my mother and she freaked out and dropped her boiling hot water on her hands and face screaming bloody murder  then I showed it my uncle and it put him in Cardiac arrest  then I showed my aunt and she is now. Eli clinically insane i wish I never downloaded this app now I’m in adoption center  because all my family is gone because of this app so download at your own risk 🙁😣😢😥

attributes.title: i’m traumatized, i wish i could give no stars.
